title: Great tour with helpful staff and a very useful app
text: Great tour with live guides on most buses. Also the app is so useful! Definitely recommend as you can see how long you need to wait at each stop. The staff on the ground were very helpful during the protests.
place: Big Bus Berlin Hop on Hop off tour with Walking Tour

title: Service and resort impeccable - we can’t wait to return
text: We went here with a baby and a disabled person and it could not have been more pleasant. The service was efficient and friendly and nothing felt like it was too much trouble. We organised a private tour through the hotel which was so good we used him again. All in all a very enjoyable hotel which we will return to.

title: Definitely worth a trip!
text: Great visit - we went on a Sunday when it was free which was nice. It wasn’t too busy as we went first thing in the morning. Lovely park around it which we wandered through on our way back.

title: Very good - definitely worth a visit
text: This was a great museum. It was well set up with plenty of space around the exhibits with very informative visits. Not a place you would spend all day so good to do with a visit to the acropolis and lunch.

title: Great service
text: Had really good service with Vicky this evening, nothing was too much trouble. The food was great and will definitely return. The portion sizes were excellent as well.

title: Great hotel
text: This hotel was super clean and tidy and the room had all the amenities needed and was a great size. We got a canal view room and it was so nice opening up the windows in the morning. I’m not really a breakfast person but there was a decent continental breakfast on offer. The staff were excellent and could not have been friendlier or more helpful.

title: Okay but could have had more information
text: Good way to spend a morning, there was a bit of a lack of signs and when we went the audio guides were not working.

title: Very good
text: Great restaurant with a nice view of the square. Good wine list and options. Make sure you know what sides your meal comes with. The apple pie was amazing

title: Really good cocktails and service
text: Such a fun place. The service was great and the cocktails were really good. Not the cheapest but good value for money.

title: Really great hotel
text: The service was excellant and the hotel is so,close to Disneyland. There is a lovely pool and the hotel is kept very clean. We had dinner and breakfast here and I thought the selection was good. The beds are comfortable and the rooms are a good size.

title: Really great food and service
text: The food here is amazing and the staff very helpful. Not as stuffy as Maze and the menu is a bit fresher as well, although the wine list a Maze is more extensive but still plenty of choices here and the sommilier was so helpful and very knowledgable. Overall we had a great evening and the Sunday bar was a lot of fun.

title: Always great Mexican here
text: This restaurant knows how to do Mexican food great and cheap. I always bring people here for a cheaper meal and no one is disappointed. It can get very busy so the noise can be an issue, if your with a big group don't expect to be able to talk to the whole table but then it's busy cause the food and cocktails are good!

title: Favourite park
text: This park is a must if you like all the swans. There always seems to be more bird life and squirrels here than at Hyde park. There isn't a lot of facilities but just enough to to be able to relax on the grass with a cold drink.

title: Always worth a visit
text: I did this when I first came to London and went on the tour around the tower. Now we always send people there for the day when we are at work. The location is great and there is so much to do then everyone seems to have a good time

title: Good bar but bit pretenscious
text: This is one of those bars that doesn't have a sign out front so you have to be in the know to enter it. They had a good cocktail and whiskey selection and the service was generally good but nothing really stood out.

title: Nice pool but fairly average hotel
text: This hotel is right at the start of the hotel strip, and like the others has a pool that leads out onto the beach. The pool staff are lovely without you feeling like they are there all the time. The concierge and tour desk are only there to sell you their expensive products. For example I asked the to book an airport shuttle for me but they refused and would only book me a transfer in their expensive cars. The food is not great and the room service so bad I had to send it back. I ordered an eye fillit with a medley of grilled vegetables and got roadkill with fries. However there are lovely places to eat along the strip and this hotel does have some very cheap specials so maybe you get what you pay for. The hotel does need a bit of work done so done expect brand new rooms and there is a bit of mould growing in the corridors.

title: Huge portion sizes
text: This is a really great place to eat with friends or family. Its quite cheap for the amount of food that you get and the service is fast and pleasant. As always the ribs were the favourite but the Mexican food and cocktails went down a treat as well. Its not too near any tube stop but then its good to walk off some of the food after!

title: Great food here as well
text: This is place is great to go if you have a few hours esp in winter as it is all indoors. They also have a nice food court and the food is better here than in any other museum that I have been to. They always have some new exhibition on as well - at the moment there is a machine that has built the most amazing outdoor structure.

title: Alwasy great food
text: The hot food here is always great with a good variety of dishes. They always have a good selection of drinks and the places is kept very clean.

title: Service is poor
text: We went here on a weekday and the service was atrocious. The waitstaff were very rude and in the end we left after having waited over half an hour for our food. When I pointed this out to our waiter he blamed the kitchen and said it would be another half hour. Didn't give me any other options so we decided to try somewhere else.

title: Very good food and service
text: Great food with a nice selection of wine. The service is very quick and friendly even during a busy Saturday lunch service. Very close to Sloane square.

title: Great Hotel and really good food
text: This hotel is not big but the staff are very friendly and the rooms very clean and comfortable. The views are amazing and the locations is right near the town. The restaurant serves very good food and there is something for everybody. I highly recommend the cocktails!

title: Good walk around but not too much to see
text: Its nice to catch the ferry over and have a walk around. There are some signs but they are old and have faded. There is a really nice ice cream place next to the ferry though.

title: Good selection and amazing cocktails
text: This restaurant was well priced with a great selection of food. The food came out quick and was very tasty. I recommend having a cocktails with the Havana club rum. They are just the thing when it is so hot!

title: Amataurish
text: I wouldn't stop here for too long. one you have to pay to see something which you can see from the bus secondly it is that great. I would recommend that you do the tourist bus tour from Vinales which is 5 CUC and the quickly get off the bus and take a photo then get back on.

title: Very pretty
text: This was a good tour mainly because of the tour guide who was very knowledgeable and spoke English well. Don't go in the afternoon in the summer though - it was very hot.

title: Great Breakfast
text: I was staying in a hotel along the strip and thought I would come here for breakfast one morning for a bit of a change. the staff here were great and the breakfast has a lot of options. I felt that the staff were always checking to see if I needed anything!

title: Nice spa but better suited to couples rather than families
text: This spa is massive there are loads of different saunas and spas. It's not really suited to families but more for couples. I started out with a massage and it was very good but they did push you into buying the spa products after.

title: Great food and Drinks
text: They have a great menu here with a lot of options. The food is always good and served fast. The servers are very quick and knowledgable about the menu.

title: I had such a good time here!
text: We did the tour that included a three course dinner at the restaurant and I enjoyed every minute of it. The person doing the whiskey tasting was very knowledgable and the food was great.

title: Amazing food!
text: This place is amazing, the food was so good and the service was perfect. From the moment that you check your cost to the last coffee or tea the service and food is impeccable. Definitely one of the best meals that I have ever had. We went with the set menu with half a bottle of wine for £45 and I thought that it was great value for money.

title: Great hotel
text: Lovely hotel, the rooms were very clean and well laid out. The breakfasts int the morning were cooked fresh and were delicious. The staff were very helpful. I would be happy recommending this hotel to anyone. Good location in the town.

title: Great restaurant right on the beach!
text: I went here for lunch and the service and food was amazing. They have an quite a large menu with options for everyone (the serving sizes are very generous) and the milkshakes are the best I've ever had! The staff are friendly and helpful with out hovering and the atmosphere is great as it's opposite the beach, if you are going to book then ask for a table on the deck. Would definitely go back any day!

title: Great hotel, very clean with good service
text: This hotel is situated in the main train station in brussels. Very handy if like us you are coming off the Eurostar. We were able to drop our bags off and check in quickly and then left to explore the city. The rooms were very clean and well laid out, making full use of the available space. The beds were very comfy and the bathrooms new and functional. I thought that it was good value for money.
